title: Grouville F.C.
text: Grouville Football Club is a <a href="Association%20Football">football</a> club based on the <a href="Channel%20Island">Channel Island</a> of <a href="Jersey">Jersey</a>. They are affiliated to the <a href="Jersey%20Football%20Association">Jersey Football Association</a> and play in the <a href="Jersey%20Football%20Combination">Jersey Football Combination</a> Championship.
